title: Filecoin Launchpad Accelerator
description: The Filecoin Launchpad Accelerator is a full-time, fully-remote program, built in collaboration with Tachyon. We're looking for startups building more open, interoperable, and programmable tools, infrastructure, and applications for the distributed web through [IPFS](https://ipfs.io/), [Filecoin](https://filecoin.io/) and [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/). The program runs for 12 weeks from June to September. Learn more here, including mentors and full details: [https://mesh.xyz/tachyon/](https://labs.consensys.net/tachyon/)
